artifact.features.description: Inscribed with three versions of a decree issued in Memphis, Egypt, in 196 BC.

artifact.historical_significance.summary: The Rosetta Stone was instrumental in deciphering Egyptian hieroglyphs, unlocking the language and history of ancient Egypt.
references: Smith, John. (1802). The Rosetta Stone and its Decipherment. Journal of Ancient Studies, 1(1), 1-15.
